original_text:
“‘Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says:
“‘Woe to the city of bloodshed!
    I, too, will pile the wood high.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 화 있을진저 피를 흘린 성읍이여 내가 또 나무 무더기를 크게 하리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says:
Woe to the city of bloodshed!
I, too, will pile the wood high.
